CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: UISelf:CheckState(true)
UISelf:CheckState(false)
Option_OnKeySet_Cancel() CallUI("SFRM_GAMEPAD") CloseUI("SFRM_KEYSET")
local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kTopParent = kSelf:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent() Option_TabChange(kTopParent, 1) end
local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kTopParent = kSelf:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent() Option_TabChange(kTopParent, 2) end
local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kTopParent = kSelf:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent() Option_TabChange(kTopParent, 3) end

OnClick_OptionETC_State(UISelf, SUBKEY_AUTOITEM_ETC) UpdateEtcConfig()

CallToolTipText(0,GetTextW(790101),GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation())
CloseToolTip()

OnClick_OptionETC_State(UISelf, SUBKEY_OFF_HELP) UpdateEtcConfig()

OnClick_Sound_MuteButton(UISelf:GetParent(), 1)
OnClick_Sound_MuteButton(UISelf:GetParent(), 2)

HSCROLL.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf SetBGMVolume((kSelf:GetScrollCur() / kSelf:GetScrollMax()), false) OnUpdate_Sound_SaveValue(kSelf:GetParent(), 1, kSelf:GetScrollCur())
local kSelf = UISelf SetEffectVolume((kSelf:GetScrollCur() / kSelf:GetScrollMax()), false) OnUpdate_Sound_SaveValue(kSelf:GetParent(), 2, kSelf:GetScrollCur())

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kGrandParent = kSelf:GetParent():GetParent() Quick_Graphic_Set(kGrandParent, 1) end
local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kGrandParent = kSelf:GetParent():GetParent() Quick_Graphic_Set(kGrandParent, 2) end
local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kGrandParent = kSelf:GetParent():GetParent() Quick_Graphic_Set(kGrandParent, 3) end
local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kGrandParent = kSelf:GetParent():GetParent() Option_SubSet(kGrandParent, 1, 1, true) end
local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kGrandParent = kSelf:GetParent():GetParent() Option_SubSet(kGrandParent, 1, 0, true) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if true==GetEventScriptSystem():IsNowActivate() then AddWarnDataTT(399900) else CallUI("SFRM_RESOLUTION") end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kGrandParent = kSelf:GetParent():GetParent() Option_SubSet(kGrandParent, 9, 1, true) end
local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kGrandParent = kSelf:GetParent():GetParent() Option_SubSet(kGrandParent, 9, 0, true) end
local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kParent = kSelf:GetParent() Option_Game_Subset(kParent, 2, 1) end
local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kParent = kSelf:GetParent() Option_Game_Subset(kParent, 2, 2) end
local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kParent = kSelf:GetParent() Option_Game_Subset(kParent, 5, 1) end
local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetCheckState() == false then local kParent = kSelf:GetParent() Option_Game_Subset(kParent, 5, 2) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT:
local kIndex = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() Option_Game_ScreenChange( kIndex )
CloseUI("SFRM_WINDOW_SETTING")

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: local list = UISelf:GetControl("LST_RESOLUTION") if not list:IsNil() then list:ClearAllListItem() local count = UISelf:GetResolutionModeCount() for i=0, count-1 do local kWidth = UISelf:GetResolutionSize(i):GetX() local kHeight = UISelf:GetResolutionSize(i):GetY() if kWidth >= 1024 and kHeight >= 768 then local kItem if true == UISelf:IsWideResolution( kWidth, kHeight ) then kItem = list:AddNewListItemChar( kWidth .. " x " .. kHeight.."("..GetTextW(399998):GetStr()..")" ) else kItem = list:AddNewListItemChar( kWidth .. " x " .. kHeight ) end if not kItem:IsNil() and not kItem:GetWnd():IsNil() then kItem:GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt( i ) end end end local size = math.min(8,count) --[[local pt = Point2(list:GetSize():GetX(), size*22) list:SetSize(pt)]] end

BUTTON.SCRIPT:
local kIndex = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() local kWidth = UISelf:GetResolutionSize( kIndex ):GetX() local kHeight = UISelf:GetResolutionSize( kIndex ):GetY() Option_Game_Subset( UISelf, 3, kWidth) Option_Game_Subset( UISelf, 4, kHeight)
local kOption = GetUIWnd("SFRM_OPTION") if not kOption:IsNil() then kGraphic = kOption:GetControl("SFRM_GRAPHIC") if not kGraphic:IsNil() then local kGraphicOption = kGraphic:GetControl("LST_GRAPHIC_OPTION") if not kGraphicOption:IsNil() then local kList = kGraphicOption:ListFirstItem() if not kList:IsNil() then local kWndResolution = kList:GetWnd("FRM_RESOLUTION") if not kWndResolution:IsNil() then local kResolution = kWndResolution:GetControl("FRM_RESOLUTION") if not kResolution:IsNil() then local kCurrent = kResolution:GetControl("FRM_CURRENT_RESOLUTION") if not kCurrent:IsNil() then kCurrent:SetStaticText( kWidth .. " x " .. kHeight ) end end end end end end end CloseUI("SFRM_RESOLUTION")
